sentences.en: A measured, muffled snore issued from Aunt Polly's chamber.
sentences.cn: 从波莉姨妈卧室里传来一阵匀称的 、 沉闷的鼾声.

sentences.en: For many, the dentist's surgery remains a torture chamber.
sentences.cn: 对许多人来说，牙医的治疗室一直是间受刑室。

sentences.en: He has mastered enough of the complexities of arrangement to write and score a piece for a chamber music ensemble.
sentences.cn: 他对改编的复杂之处已有了足够的掌握，能够谱写一部室内合奏曲了。

sentences.en: Her instructor plugged live bullets into the gun's chamber.
sentences.cn: 她的教练在枪膛里装上了实弹。

sentences.en: I went to the room which he had called the nuptial chamber.
sentences.cn: 我走进了他称之为洞房的房间。

sentences.en: It was an adaptation of Wilson's cloud chamber, filled with nitrogen gas.
sentences.cn: 这只是对威尔逊氮气云室的一种改进.

sentences.en: She could hear the tinny strains of a chamber orchestra.
sentences.cn: 她能听见室内管弦乐队尖细的旋律。

sentences.en: The archeologists found fragments of bone in the burial chamber.
sentences.cn: 考古学家在墓穴中发现了碎骨片.

sentences.en: The chamber was ablaze with light.
The members left the council chamber.
The murderer was executed in a gas chamber.
The Speaker is preceded by the mace-bearer upon his entry to the chamber.
sentences.cn: 当议长走进议事厅的时候，前面由执议长权标的人开路。

sentences.en: Then the Chamber of Commerce offices in Bellingham and Seattle.
sentences.cn: 然后是贝灵汉和西雅图的商会办公室.

sentences.en: We are going to be in the council chamber every time he speaks.
sentences.cn: 我们每次都在会议厅听他讲话。

sentences.en: We are going to make sure we are in the council chamber every time he speaks.
sentences.cn: 每次他发表讲话我们都会确保赶到市会议厅去。

words.tran_cn: 把…关在室内；装填（弹药等）

phrases.tran_cn: 国际商会；国际工农商会

trans.tran_cn: (作特殊用途的)房间，议会，(人体、植物或机器内部的)腔，私人房间
trans.tran_en: an enclosed space, especially in your body or inside a machine

trans.tran_cn: 把…关在室内；装填（弹药等）

trans.tran_en: an enclosed space, especially in your body or inside a machine
